content.text:
# Battle of Ochagavía

| result            = Pelucones Victory
*Establishment of the Government Junta of Chile
| combatant1        =  Pelucones (Conservatives)
| combatant2        =  Pipiolos (Liberals)
| commander1        = Joaquín Prieto Vial
| commander2        = Francisco de la Lastra
| strength1         = Unknown
| strength2         = Unknown
| territory         = Pipiolos withdraw from Ochagavía
}}
Battle of Ochagavía was the first battle of the Chilean Civil War of 1829-1830 between the forces of Pipiolos (liberals), led by Francisco de la Lastra y de la Sotta and Pelucones (conservatives) led by Joaquín Prieto Vial. Francisco de la Lastra's forces have been defeated in the battle.
References
